description.narrative:
2.1 Through successfully held trainings on topics of business and entrepreneurship trained and certified potential and existing entrepreneurs Number of potential and existing entrepreneurs certified 100/ 30woman 2.2 Through successfully held trainings on topics of business and entrepreneurship trained for Eye Program certified potential and existing entrepreneurs Number of potential and existing entrepreneurs certified 160 / 35 woman 2.3 Through successfully delivered grants business started or expanded Number of matchmaking accomplished 10 2.4 Through successfully held sessions, survey/research conducted Number of session held Number of market researches done 3 1 2.5 New BCZ Clients from municipalities: Zubin Potok, Leposavic and Mitrovica Number of new BCZ clients registered in BCZ database 80/25 woman
2.6 Business plans approved and ready for finance. Approved business plans 50/25 woman
2.7 Best Business ideas approved Number of BBI forms approved 15/5 woman 2.8 Stimulation for business start up Number of awards given 12/3 women 2.9. Through successfully held B2B event matchmaking between entrepreneurs was realized Number of events created Matches accomplished 2 10/3 woman 2.10 Through an educational study visit successful matchmaking between entrepreneurs was realized Matches accomplished 10/3 woman 2.11 Successfully held consultancy sessions and meetings for support, growth or start-up of SMEs Number of SMEs owners/ potential entrepreneurs supported by consultancy 50/15 woman

Entrepreneurs and SMEs established in the previous phases of the project, existing businesses, and entrepreneurs from North Kosovo municipalities: Zvecan, Mitrovica, Leposavic and Zubin Potok. Young entrepreneurs, as promoters of new development initiatives. Farmers from North Kosovo. Community of the North Kosovo.

Entrepreneurship Development Initiatives II is aimed to further develop entrepreneurship in North Kosovo trough additional forms of trainings and support. The established supportive mechanism for entrepreneurs with leading role of Business Centre Zvecan shall be further developed beyond the promoter of new economic development initiatives in this area to the key actor supporting business/entrepreneurs development
Mobilizing creative and research and development potentials with the aim of rendering new ideas and supporting their translation into successful commercial projects, business plans, and job creation activities.
The proposed activity shall strive to contribute to:
Poverty alleviation through job creation in SME - facilitation of start and growth of SME that will create jobs and raise income levels among the poor, women and marginalized, through the development of existing business development organizations and/ or the establishment of new ones.

mailing-address.narrative: BC Zvecan Kosovskih junaka 4 ZVECAN Kosovo (XK)
